text: Hello! I am here on part of the 'Save the Children' Foundation.
Hi! Nice to meet you here. Can you tell me more about yourself or your Fpundation?
We are an international organization that promote's children's rights and we help to support them in any ywayy ywe can.
Where is your main office located?
Our main office is located in the U.S.A but we help kids all over the world.
That's is a very good cause. Does your Foundation have a website where we can learn more about things you do?
We sure do. Our website is  URL
Thanks. How can people make a donation to your Foundation?
Most people donate through the website but you have the option to donate some or all of your incoming payment to the kids.
Does your website contain pictures about the kids you help?
Yes there are some of the children featured on the website.
I know you promote children's rights but do you also help them with their basic needs especially in poor countries?
Yes we make sure to feed as many kids as we can every day.
Does your Foundation help kids in war torn nations like Syria? I heard from the news that there are lots of children affected by that war.
Yes the Syrian crisis has been very hard on those poor children.
What about children stricken with cancer? I had a friend who had a child with leukemia and it was a tragic loss. I would like to help or donate a small amount to these children.
We do a vast amount of help with getting children the medical care the need. We work closely with the hospitals to make sure they are taken care of as best as possible.
Ok I will be making a small donation to your website. It is the least thing I can do to help these poor children.
That is great! The kids will be very glad to get your help. The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children. How much would you like to donate?
I would like to donate 20 dollars. Will that be good enough?
Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
OK thanks
